message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value to us and the potential it holds for you, I am extending an initial offer of $950000 for the product.

Dear Alice, thank you for your initial offer. After careful consideration, I am willing to make a counteroffer of $850000 for the product. I believe this price is more in line with its value to me, and I hope we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After reviewing your proposal, I am happy to counter with an offer of $900000 for the product. I believe this price reflects its value while remaining competitive. I look forward to your response.

Dear Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a counteroffer of $875000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I see in it.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your perspective and respect your valuation of the product. I am willing to consider $925000 as a fair price for the product, reflecting both its value to us and its potential value to you. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Dear Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer of $880000 for the product. I believe this is the highest price I'm willing to pay, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your continued engagement, Bob. I understand your position and respect your decision. I am willing to consider $900000 as a fair price for the product, acknowledging its value to you and staying within our desired price range. I hope this offer meets your expectations and allows us to move forward.

Dear Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer of $850000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. I am willing to consider $875000 as a fair price for the product, reflecting its value and acknowledging your budget constraints. I hope this offer will be acceptable to you.

Dear Alice, I'm disappointed that we couldn't reach an agreement. However, I'm willing to make one last attempt. I'm willing to pay $825000 for the product, which is my absolute maximum. If this is not acceptable, I will have to consider buying from John for $800000.
